TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SdlChannelSink extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelSinkBase, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSink
Public Class SdlChannelSink Implements IChannelSinkBase, IServerChannelSink

summary.span: 提供伺服器通道接收的實作，在伺服器上動態產生 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL)。

span.span: Provides the implementation for a server channel sink that generates Web Services Description Language (WSDL) dynamically on the server.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 用來在 URL 字串的結束位置的情況下建立 WSDL"？ wsdl"。The is used to create WSDL in situations where the URL ends with the string "?wsdl". 下表顯示組態屬性可指定給目前通道的通道。The following table shows the channel configuration properties that can be specified for this channel sink. 前兩個屬性結合，以控制 WSDL 的發行集所發行的應用程式定義域的物件。The first two properties combine to control the WSDL publication of objects published by the application domain. 如果`false`針對指定的第一個屬性，沒有 WSDL 傳回，而不論第二個屬性。If `false` is specified for the first property, no WSDL is returned, regardless of the second property. (預設值為 `true`)。否則，第二個控制是否允許全域中繼資料物件的 URI 回應。(The default is `true`.) Otherwise, the second controls whether the global metadata object URI is permitted to respond. (預設值為 `false`)。(The default is `false`.) |屬性Property|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| |`metadataEnabled`|布林值，指定是否要接受要求結尾的"？ wsdl"如果是通道接收鏈結中的這個接收。A Boolean value that specifies whether to honor requests that end in "?wsdl" if this sink is in the channel sink chain. 預設的設定值是 `true`。The default setting is `true`. 如果為 `false`，則只要應用程式定義域中的任何物件要求中繼資料，這個接收便會擲回例外狀況。If `false`, the sink throws an exception in all cases where metadata is requested for any object in the application domain.

.NET Framework 1.1 版只有在下列平台上才支援這個屬性：Windows 98、Windows NT 4.0、Windows Millennium Edition、Windows 2000、Windows XP Home (家用版)、Windows XP Professional (商用版)、Windows Server 2003 系列。This property is supported only by the .NET Framework version 1.1 on the following platforms: Windows 98, Windows NT 4.0, Windows Millennium Edition, Windows 2000, Windows XP Home Edition, Windows XP Professional, Windows Server 2003 family.| |`remoteApplicationMetadataEnabled`|布林值，指定是否要接受要求的物件 URI"RemoteApplicationMetadata？ wsdl"，它會傳回描述所發行的所有物件的 WSDL 應用程式定義域。A Boolean value that specifies whether to honor requests for the object URI "RemoteApplicationMetadata?wsdl", which returns WSDL that describes all objects that are published by the application domain. 如果`false`，任何 「 RemoteApplicationMetadata.rem"的要求會擲回的例外狀況。If `false`, then any request to "RemoteApplicationMetadata.rem" throws an exception. 所有其他"？ wsdl"會接受要求特定物件的 Uri。All other "?wsdl" requests for particular object URIs are honored. 如果為 `true`，則會承認全域中繼資料要求。If `true`, the global metadata request is honored. 預設的設定值是 `false`。The default setting is `false`.

.NET Framework 1.1 版只有在下列平台上才支援這個屬性：Windows 98、Windows NT 4.0、Windows Millennium Edition、Windows 2000、Windows XP Home (家用版)、Windows XP Professional (商用版)、Windows Server 2003 系列。This property is supported only by the .NET Framework version 1.1 on the following platforms: Windows 98, Windows NT 4.0, Windows Millennium Edition, Windows 2000, Windows XP Home Edition, Windows XP Professional, Windows Server 2003 family.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會在其叫用為訊息物件的方法呼叫轉換為 proxy 的作業。The proxy's job is to convert a method call that is invoked on it into a message object. 訊息物件，它會實作介面，請傳遞從用戶端到伺服器端叫用訊息接收物件。The Message object, which implements the interface, is passed from the client end to the server end by invoking on message sink objects. 訊息接收鏈結在一起，這表示每個訊息接收會負責呼叫上它已執行其工作之後的下一個訊息接收。Message sinks are chained together, which means that every message sink is responsible for calling on the next message sink after it has performed its work. 比方說，同步處理相關訊息接收可能會造成鎖定，以取得或釋放及委派給下游訊息接收。For instance, a synchronization-related message sink might cause a lock to be acquired or released and delegated to the downstream message sink. 格式器通道接收時取得一個訊息，需要透過管道傳送，它會呼叫，將訊息傳遞做為參數。When the formatter channel sink gets a message that needs to be sent over the channel, it calls , passing the message as a parameter. 呼叫與傳輸標頭陣列，接著會建立格式器接收格式器接收上。The formatter sink then creates the transport header array and calls on the formatter sink. 這個呼叫會在接收鏈結中向下轉送，且任何接收都可建立將會傳回格式器接收的要求資料流。This call is forwarded down the sink chain, and any sink can create a request stream that is passed back to the formatter sink. 在此之後呼叫傳回時，序列化訊息，接收鏈結中的第一個鏈結上呼叫，並將訊息傳遞給通道接收。After this call returns, the message is serialized, is called on the first chain in the sink chain, and the message is passed to the channel sinks. 通道接收之後收到訊息，寫入資料流資料、 將標頭加入至標頭陣列，便能將本身新增至接收堆疊中，然後再將轉送至下一個接收呼叫。After the channel sinks get the message, they can write data to the stream, add headers to the header array, and add themselves to the sink stack before forwarding the call to the next sink. 當呼叫到達傳輸接收鏈結的結尾時，傳輸接收會傳送標頭，並序列化訊息到伺服器，其中相反的程序在通道上。When the call reaches the transport sink at the end of the chain, the transport sink sends the headers and serialized message over the channel to the server, where the process is reversed. 在訊息到達伺服器端，傳輸接收會擷取標頭和序列化資料流中的訊息並透過轉送這些接收鏈結直到他們達到格式器接收。When the message reaches the server side, the transport sink retrieves the headers and serialized message from the stream and forwards these through the sink chain until they reach the formatter sink. 格式器接收然後還原序列化訊息，並將它轉送到遠端執行功能，其中訊息會轉換成方法呼叫，而呼叫的伺服器物件。The formatter sink then deserializes the message and forwards it to remoting, where the message is turned into a method call and the server object is called.
